item.title: Rihanna’s Super Bowl halftime show officially broke the record for most watched Super Bowl halftime show in history, Roc Nation reports.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: “An initial reporting error was corrected by Nielsen, resulting in this halftime performance being the most-watched record.”
item.author: PopBase

item.title: Rihanna’s Super Bowl halftime show officially broke the record for most watched Super Bowl halftime show in history, Roc Nation reports.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: Megan Thee Stallion stuns in new photos.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: The second official single off ‘Lemonade’ peaked at #11 on the Billboard Hot 100 and earned a 3x Platinum certification in the US. It received praise from critics and spawned the “Becky with the good hair” line.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: The fifth single off ‘LOUD’ peaked at #59 on the Billboard Hot 100 and earned a 2x Platinum certification in the US. It was praised as one of the album’s highlights and has racked up over 900 million views on YouTube.
item.author: PopBase
